about.title: About AstroGroot
about.intro: AstroGroot is an automated research library covering astronomy, space science, and robotics. It collects, processes, and indexes content from multiple sources:

sources.papers: Research papers from arXiv (astronomy, rockets & robotics)

about.ai: All content is processed using Claude AI for summarization and semantic search via vector embeddings.

seo.homeDescription: Explore astronomy, robotics papers, videos, and NASA content with AI-powered search
seo.searchDescription: Search astronomy & robotics research papers, videos, and NASA content
seo.searchResultsDescription: Search results for "{query}" in astronomy, robotics papers, videos, and NASA content
seo.notFoundDescription: The requested page could not be found.

error404.title: Lost in Space
error404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist in this galaxy.
